name: Solo fighter (android game)
description:
Solo fighter – is a game for Android by Touch Force, which is a mixture of genres Runner and Top-down shooter.

In the game you have to pass the levels at which you will just run, but then on the left, then on the right will appear enemies, eager for your death.
Try to overcome evil alone and complete all levels!

Our VK group (Russian): https://vk.com/touchforce
